pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, June 21, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Prince Rupert, British Columbia

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an announcement with First Nations leaders. A media availability will follow.

Prince Rupert Canadian Coast Guard facility

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 8:20 a.m. at the Highliner Plaza Hotel (815 1st Avenue West) and will be shuttled to the event.
    • All access to the Coast Guard facility is restricted to shuttles due to parking restraints. For more information, please contact Tom Wakefield (604-616-6569).
